title: Immersive Full-Screen Mode - APK
description:

Enter the all new KitKat Immersive Mode. Get full screen on any application.
This is a complete rewrite of hidebar made for the latest version of android, KitKat. This tool can enter and leave the new Immersive Mode so that you can take advantage of every pixel on your screen. This will thus hide the navigation bar at the bottom of the screen.
Features:
* Enter and leave immersive mode from settings
* Enter and leave immersive mode from the notification area
* Choose to also hide the status bar on top
Known issues:
* Keyboard will not show up on text entry (workaround: when entering text, first leave immersive mode)
--- The issue is being worked on. You might prefer to delay installing this software until this also works correctly.
Contact:
For any questions or feature requests, contact the developer.
